title: Higher ping than usual
body: Im a player from singapore and my ping has increased from 100-130 to currently 160+ ping. What happened that may have caused this change? I have been playing with the same ping for a few months and when I came back from holiday and decided to play again, the increase in the ping has made the game quite unfun to play. What are some solutions that i can perform to get back to my original ping?

replies.body: i have exactly same issue, i used to have 60-70ping, now i have 95-105 ping last 2 days, can't enjoy the game. Worst part cant figure out why, reinstalled league, used hextech tool or what ever it is, reinstalled internet drivers, seems like i dont get higher ping in any other games only in league.
anyone found a solution for this :(?
